task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 5 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create CRUD operations for teams including creation, retrieval with member count, updates, and invite link generation with 7-day expiry
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create src/api/teams.rs with handlers: - POST /api/teams: create_team(Json<CreateTeamDto>) -> Json<TeamResponse> * Insert into teams table * Add creator as owner in team_members - GET /api/teams/:id: get_team(Path<Uuid>) -> Json<TeamWithMemberCount> * JOIN with team_members to count members * Check user has access (is member) - PATCH /api/teams/:id: update_team(Path<Uuid>, Json<UpdateTeamDto>) * Verify user is owner/admin - POST /api/teams/:id/invite: generate_invite(Path<Uuid>) * Create UUID token, store in invites table with expires_at = now() + 7 days * Return invite URL 2. Define DTOs in src/domain/team.rs 3. Implement authorization checks using role from team_members

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-5): Implement team management API endpoints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Integration tests: create team as user A, verify user A can access, user B cannot. Test invite generation and expiry. Test PATCH requires admin role. Verify member count accuracy
